programme.title: Wildest Islands: Vancouver Island: Rivers of Life
programme.desc: Vancouver island is the largest island off the west coast of North America. Glaciers fuel the flow of some of Canada's tallest waterfalls, and an endless network of rivers and creeks provides the ideal habitat for the pacific salmon.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Galapagos: Darwin's Eden
programme.desc: The Galapagos archipelago contains 13 main islands and a hundred or so smaller rocks and reefs. The region's wilderness is so pristine and rich in life. / Lying like a teardrop in the Indian Ocean, Sri Lanka is an island that defies convention.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: The Hebrides: Land of Legends

programme.title: Wildest Middle East: Arabia: Land of Illusions

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: The Tundra: Desert of Ice

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 4
programme.desc: Tonight, we travel to South Australia to see used car dealers DONNA & READE devise and prepare their own three-course menu. There will be thrills and spills as they battle the clock and their nerves to plate up on time.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 5
programme.desc: Tonight, we head south to Tasmania to see recently married couple JAMES & MELANIE devise and prepare their three-course menu. There will be thrills and spills as they battle the clock and their nerves to plate up on time.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Cold Blooded
programme.desc: Time of death is an important consideration in a murder investigation, but when a killer freezes, burns, or grinds his victim, even the most skilled medical examiner would be at a loss about how to calculate it.

programme.title: The New Detectives: A Deadly Smile
programme.desc: Investigators rely on forensic odontology to identify a body from a single tooth and to catch two brutal killers from their bite marks.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Natural Witness
programme.desc: The Great Outdoors may offer great clues to solving brutal murders. But it takes the keen eye of the forensic entomologist and botanist to decipher the clues nature provides.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Web of Clues
programme.desc: Forensic Entomology: Bugs have roamed the earth for 250 million years, but their intimate association with death is just now coming to life.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Raw Greed
programme.desc: A friendly Midwest lodge becomes the scene of a gruesome double murder. Two men are dead and a safe filled with cash is missing.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs are given a communication challenge. VIP guests for dinner service include astronaut Buzz Aldrin.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Kris Jenner and Dita Von Teese enjoy duck dishes as one team pulls off a near-perfect dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The winners of this week's challenge enjoy a wine blending experience, before a disastrous dinner service leads to a shock departure.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Dinner sees the 12 remaining chefs serving octopus, steak and lobster, but lacklustre performances from both teams leave Gordon Ramsay far from impressed.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must create six unique dishes for former sous chef Andi; while the challenge winners spend the night in Las Vegas, the losing team makes a mountain of macaroons; dinner service has the contestants cooking for Andi's wedding reception.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay's gruelling chef challenge continues. The ten remaining chefs are challenged to create unique dishes with a limited number of ingredients.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel is back at it, as one of his most eccentric clients throws down the challenge on a lead sled transformation

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel continues the Lead Sled Challened

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel does the unthinkable with his wild show car

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel continues the journey with his wild show car

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel attempts to complete his wild show car

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: An inside look at Full Custom Garage.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Leper's Kiss
programme.desc: A hitman by the name of the Leper is targeting the leaders of the New Commonwealth.

programme.title: Andromeda: For Whom the Bell Tolls
programme.desc: The Andromeda is haunted by a mysterious creature that comes aboard during a solar storm.

programme.title: Andromeda: And Your Heart Will Fly Away
programme.desc: When a long lost love returns, Tyr disappears from the ship to protect her from an assassin.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Unconquerable Man
programme.desc: Set in an alternate universe where Dylan died and Gaheris Rhade is trying to reform the Commonwealth.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The group that attacked the Andromeda during the first Commonwealth charter signing returns to wreak more havoc.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Dark Backward
programme.desc: Trance runs through a number of different scenarios, trying to find one in which her crewmates don't die.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: Our new team of “ Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to unmask the killer – or killers – of vivacious New Zealand hairdresser Paula Brown who was plucked from Sydney’s downtown after a night out with friends.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Walk of Innocence
programme.desc: In 1970, eighteen-year-old Olive Waiker disappeared as she walked across Rotorua to babysit her nieces and nephews. Her semi-naked body was found hours later in a rest area south of the city..

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Without Warning
programme.desc: This week’s episode of Sensing Murder promises greater co-operation between psychics and police, attempting to uncover the truth about the death of 18-year-old apprentice plumber Regan O’Donoghue, who was killed in a hit and run in 2007.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Looking for Justice
programme.desc: This week, for the first time ever, the prime suspect in a murder enquiry has turned to Sensing Murder for help.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: When The Trail Goes Cold
programme.desc: This episodes involves the disappearance of 62-year-old Kaye Stewart, a woman who went missing while on a short walk on June 13th, 2005.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: The Patient Killer
programme.desc: In 1976, thirteen-year-old schoolgirl Tracey Ann Patient was plucked off Auckland's Great North Road. The following morning, her body was found dumped 16 km away in the Waitakere Ranges, having been strangled with a pantyhose tourniquet.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Greenough Family Massacre
programme.desc: The small hamlet of Greenough, near Geraldton in Western Australia, some 400 kilometres north of Perth, will forever be associated with one the most horrific murders in Australian criminal history.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Date With a Serial Killer: Rodney Cameron
programme.desc: Rodney Francis Cameron was dubbed ‘The Lonely Hearts Killer’ after he used a radio match-making program in 1990 to lure an unsuspecting woman to her death. Incredibly, he had only just been released from prison for two other killings in 1974.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Snowtown: Bodies in the Barrels
programme.desc: In 1999, eight bodies are found in six barrels filled with acid in a former bank vault in rural Snowtown, 50 kilometres north of Adelaide.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Death in a Heartbeat / The Body in the Bag
programme.desc: CI examines the Dr. Victor Chang extortion murder as well as the horrific Jane Doe Case where a girl is found lying on the side of the road of an inner Sydney suburb wrapped in two plastic garbage bags.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No Mercy: The Killing of Virginia Morse
programme.desc: The horrific story of killers Allan Baker and Kevin Crump who began their murderous spree in rural NSW by killing a complete stranger for $20, a packet of cigarettes and a couple of litres of petrol.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Pearl
programme.desc: Jodi risks everything to help Luke, when she learns he has been blackmailed by a criminal gang.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Prodigal Daughter
programme.desc: Tess’s mysterious cousin, Regan, makes instant enemies when she visits Drovers Run. Stevie must rely on Regan’s help to escape a life-threatening farm accident.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Love and Obsession
programme.desc: As Dave and Regan fall for each other, Kate realises Regan has a secret she’ll do anything to protect.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: One Long Day
programme.desc: Stevie faces the most harrowing hour of her life when Charlotte goes missing on Drovers Run. When Nick is offered a job in Argentina, Tess is torn between her husband and her property.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Down to Earth
programme.desc: Tess delays her flight to Argentina, when she learns of Regan’s plans to mine Drovers Run. Jodi and Alex take an instant dislike to Killarney’s arrogant new overseer.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Heart of Gold
programme.desc: It’s McLeod versus McLeod as Tess fights to stop Regan’s mining claim on Drovers Run.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chad Hallock, the co-founder of Budget Blinds, the largest window covering Franchise Company in the United States, is going undercover and posing as an out of work artist looking for a new career.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Flooded Souls
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Hales Bar Dam and Marina in Tennessee, to investigate a dam that was built on Native American land.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Overdue For Death
programme.desc: Newly designated as a \\"Literary Landmark,\\" this library is consumed with ghostly visitors with a thirst for knowledge.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Don’t Forget About Us
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Franklin, Kentucky to investigate Octagon Hallwhere secret tunnels have been found under the house, which are believed to have hidden confederate soldiersduring the civil war.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghostly Evidence
programme.desc: A mother's suicide tortures four generations of one family.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Houghton Hears A Who?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Short Handed
programme.desc: Dog's target today has a history of violence, and apparently plans to re-locate without notifying the proper authorities. Unfortunately the team is missing a key player, Duane Lee is MIA today distracted by his new lady love.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Photo Op
programme.desc: Dog and Duane Lee can't agree about what role Duane Lee should have in the family business. But the family comes together as they set out to hunt a chronic violator with an open warrant and a wife who has an odd request for Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A House Divided
programme.desc: Dog has dropped Duane Lee from the team. When Leland confronts Dog and Beth about the decision tempers flare. But they have to come together to answer a cry for help from a mother who feels that the safest place for her daughter is jail.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All Grown Up
programme.desc: Cecily has graduated from High School and Dog believes the time is right to show her what the family business is all about. The rough and tumble world of bounty hunting is very different than the all girls private school she attended.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fight Like A Girl
programme.desc: This one is close to home. Dog's target on today's hunt is the cousin of Kali, Garry Boy's caregiver. In addition, she has a reputation as a brawler. With Duane Lee still missing from the team Baby Lyssa decides she will step-up in this hunt.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Higher Power
programme.desc: In an attempt to bring the team back together, Dog recruits his pastor, Tim Storey, to be the peacemaker. As Dog begins his hunt for a young man who has trouble showing up at court, Tim has his own mission - convince Duane Lee to meet with him.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ties That Bind
programme.desc: With Duane Lee back on the team, the rift in the Chapman clan appears over. But will time heal this wound? As the family heads out for the seedier side of Honolulu in search of an erotic dancer, we will find out if the wound is truly healed.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Who's the Boss
programme.desc: When can a bounty hunt also be a date? When Dog and Beth decide to ride in the same SUV as they pursue a run away fugitive, will their different approaches to the investigation lead to a capture and romance?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bus Stop Bruiser
programme.desc: When an alleged abuser goes on the lame, Dog gathers the team to bring him in. As the leads grow colder Dog's determination only grows stronger. Finally, a hot lead comes in and Dog sets the trap for his prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Luck Be A Lady
programme.desc: Dog and company head to the Big Island in pursuit of two courthouse no-shows only to find that one of them appears to be posting status updates from Southern California.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hallu-Si-Nations
programme.desc: With Willie out-of-town, the guys decide to flake off work and leave to brush up the duck blinds on the Robertson land. While out, Si believes he spots what he thinks is the infamous 'Black Panther'.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Let's Go Hunting, Deer
programme.desc: Willie and Jase invite Korie and Missy along on a deer hunt because they believe their wives have become too "city." At Phil and Kay's, Miss Kay decides she wants to frame Phil's original blueprints from the first duck call he created.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Tickets To The Fun Show
programme.desc: During Duck Commander's "Casino Night" party, Si Robertson wins the grand prize of $2000 and decides to buy a massage chair for the duck call room. The massage chair becomes a detriment to the workflow, so Willie takes Si around for a replacement prize.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Be a Lady
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ring Around the Redneck
programme.desc: Though Jase lost his wedding ring long ago, Missy decides it's time for Jase to replace it with a new one. When Jase is duck hunting, once again, he loses the ring.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bass Man Standing
programme.desc: The Duck Commander team is invited to unveil a wing of the local Bass Pro shop that will feature their products.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Battle of the Brothers
programme.desc: Willie's suspicious behavior from dyeing his beard to buying a new motorcycle, makes Jase come to the conclusion that Willie is having a mid-life crisis.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Aloha, Robertsons!
programme.desc: After all their hard work, Willie decides to take the entire Robertson clan on a family vacation to Hawaii. But Willie's daily itinerary for the trip gets constantly undermined by the family's desire to participate in their own island activities.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Till Duck Do Us Part
programme.desc: Everyone comes together to plan a surprise wedding for Phil and Kay, setting up a special ceremony on their land, which the whole family attends. Si distracts Phil and Kay by taking them on a "trip down memory lane".

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Bears converge on an injured tree faller alone in the wilderness as Nelson SAR races to the scene.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Kent Harrison uses high tech sonar to help RCMP search for a missing camper.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: A snowmobiler trapped 30 metres down an icy crevasse says goodbye to his wife and family.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR team up with a local psychic to find a missing person.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Rossland SAR employs high tech and local knowledge to search for missing skiers.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler SAR is on a mountain mission for missing friends who failed to show up for a landmark birthday party.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Several SAR teams are called out after 200 snowmobilers arereported buried on Boulder Mountain near Revelstoke BC.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler SAR extracts a severely injured stunt snowmobiler. And later, teams search for two people swept down a raging river.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler Search and Rescue helicopter long-lines an injured snowmobiler off a steep mountainside.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In Crawford Bay near Nelson British Columbia, search teams are looking for a missing 1946 two-seater vintage Ercoupe.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Heart Break Hotel
programme.desc: Brianna says Steven constantly looks at other women behind her back which has taken a toll on her confidence. He says her overprotectiveness leads to arguments that end up with her accusing him of cheating.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Tapped Out
programme.desc: Lataisha says Chris smokes weed all day and can’t keep a job. Things seemed to be going fine until one day she walked downstairs in their home and realized that Chris moved out. Chris says he left because she is too aggressive.

programme.title: Divorce Court: In My Feelings
programme.desc: Raymond, also known as @IamRollingRay, is an Instagram sensation who says his high school sweetheart is jealous of his social media fan base. Christian thinks Ray shows more attention to his fanbase, accusing him of cheating with his followers.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Caught Up
programme.desc: Syncere says Mark has lied and disrespected her on several occasions and she’s not going to stand for it anymore. Mark says he cheats on Syncere because she has a bad attitude and she gets on his nerves.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 1
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 2
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lesbihonest
programme.desc: Porcha has had enough of Ivory's promiscuous behavior. He claims Porcha has more tricks and secrets than Houdini and her lying has taken its toll. Can Judge Lynn Toler help this couple or is it time for Cupid to take better aiming lessons?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Johnny on the Spot
programme.desc: Cornisha says Jawaun leaves for weeks at a time and returns broke and jobless. He says Cornisha is too bossy and picks fights causing him to blow up and take days away to cool down. Will they find a cooling point before their relationship melts down?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Game Boy
programme.desc: Christy is done with Demetrice's video game obsession! He said he's better off with his games than being accused of looking at every woman that passes by. Will Demetrice snap back into reality or is this game over?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hashtag Freaky
programme.desc: Anita says Ronald is a chronic cheater and a sex addict. He demands sex constantly and when doesn’t get his way, he admits he feels forced to seek sex outside the marriage. Can Judge Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Crazy About You
programme.desc: Mali is five years younger than his girlfriend Zay and they are total opposites. He still wants to party, and she is ready to settle down.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Out for Delivery
programme.desc: Jeanine says Marvin is cheating with co-workers and often meets up with his exes when they visit family in their hometown. He asserts she’s the one who cheated, not him, and she is so insecure she won’t stop bugging him about it.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: What do you do when you have a fugitive you not only want to find, but believe can be helped back onto the straight and narrow? If you're Mary Ellen you call your good friend Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tent City
programme.desc: Today's hunt takes Dog far from the glittering hotels of Waikiki to the parts of Hawaii tourist rarely see, Oahu's ramshackle tent cities. The team searches for a woman who has lost almost everything, her home, her family and her spirit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Island, Small Town
programme.desc: Dog has problems when he goes to a small town on the Big Island of Hawaii to track down a fugitive. In a small town, everyone knows everyone else's business, making it impossible for Dog to hunt in secret.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cap and Gown
programme.desc: Friend of the family, Kili, is joining the team to help track down a runner on the Hawaiian island of Maui. This is not the only thing on their schedule, because after the hunt, Kili has to hurry off to his college graduation ceremony!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Love and to Cherish
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are off to the Big Island for their wedding. They hope to relax for a few days but it turns out Leland has a fugitive he needs to catch and despite the time limit, neither Dog nor Beth can resist the opportunity to catch a fugitive.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Wrong Turn
programme.desc: Dog's target today seems to have a taste for drugs and a record of reckless driving. The hunt has deep emotional resonance for the team because today is the anniversary of the fatal car accident of Dog's daughter Barbara Katie.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Wieners and Losers
programme.desc: After quitting the law firm, Joan goes from the courtrooms to food courts.

programme.title: Girlfriends: He Loves Her, He Loves Me Not
programme.desc: William’s new girlfriend claims he is in love with Joan.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The My First Job Episode
programme.desc: Lindsey gets her first job at a fast food restaurant, but soon gets fired when she gives out free food.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Tiger Dad Episode
programme.desc: Nick tries to become a more effective parent, so he pushes Kevin and Lindsey to become better people.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Expensive Purse Episode
programme.desc: Against Nick's wishes, Suzanne buys an expensive purse and Nick becomes suspicious about it, so he uses her guilt to his advantage.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Master of Ceremonies Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne becomes the subject to Nick's joke-off, and Suzanne retaliates against him.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Control Issue Episode
programme.desc: When Nick makes a point that Suzanne is too controlling of the family, Suzanne backs off the issue and later the family realizes that her controlling ways are just what they need.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Ghost Dog Episode
programme.desc: Nick, Suzanne, and Kevin pull pranks on each other, but their addiction leads to a near-death experience.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Lemon Squeeze Episode
programme.desc: Gigi uses an adequate exercise when the family refuses to stop fighting with each other.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Mother's-in-Law Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne's overprotective mother arrives and causes tension between her and Nick when she questions Nick's abilities as a husband.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Tit for Tat Episode
programme.desc: A newly hired, attractive woman threatens Nick's job at the station.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Church of the Damned

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.139

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.52

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.171

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.127

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.173

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.75
programme.desc: Young man admits to being drunk and possessing marijuana but denies throwing rock through woman's window. Man cares for injured mother after father's death; fight over credit card debt and estate divides them.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.9
programme.desc: An Escalade rental for a group of partying teenagers ends in a lawsuit between a limo company and a frustrated mother who claims she was lied to by the owner.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.46

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.144

programme.title: World's Greatest: Treks
programme.desc: Every journey made by foot promises a grand adventure. From the highest mountains to the wildest jungle realms, treks venture down the road less travelled, allowing us to connect to nature, history, and culture, one step at a time.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Ancient Cities
programme.desc: In Ancient Cities, we journey to these ancestors of influence such as Luang Prabang, Vienna, and Istanbul where religious and cultural centers have shaped the ways in which we view the world around us and continue to do so in modern times.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Bridges
programme.desc: A bridge is a structure that’s designed to transcend, but a great bridge can define the place where it stands. Symbols of human ingenuity, beauty, and grandeur, bridges connect us not only to each other but also to the past.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Island Nations
programme.desc: Though many are small in stature, they have punched well above their weight on the global stage. Some are rooted in ancient history, while others are only just beginning to realize their full potential.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Archipelagos
programme.desc: The romantic notion of island life has always attracted us. Explore the histories, cultures, and unique ways of life on the World’s Greatest Archipelagos - clusters of islands that share common bonds of geography, geology, and genealogy.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Weighs In/The Law of the Jungle Gym
programme.desc: When Arthur doesn't fit into his costume for the play, he's shocked to learn that he's gotten "husky-sized." He gets serious about getting in shape. Muffy found the perfect place to take pictures with her new digital camera: the jungle gym.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's First Sleepover/Arthur's New Year's Eve
programme.desc: Have you ever been afraid of the dark? Despite D.W.'s threat of aliens, Arthur sets his tent for his first sleepover. Then, what exactly happens at midnight, December 31st? There are plenty of rumors, but no one seems to know for sure.

programme.title: Arthur: Brain's Brain/Brain Sees Stars
programme.desc: Brain's Easter egg hunts are notoriously hard. But this year's might prove impossible if Brain can't remember where he hid the final egg. Then, crazy coincidences have prevented Brain from seeing a meteor shower in person.

programme.title: Arthur: The Case of the Girl with the Long Face/The Substitute Arthur
programme.desc: Fern's been feeling low and no one can figure out why. Luckily, Buster Baxter is on the case! With Arthur out of town, Buster is on the hunt for a new best friend, but he only wants to play games HIS way. Will Buster learn to compromise?

programme.title: Arthur: Fright Night/Citizen Cheikh
programme.desc: Buster’s Uncle Bob – portrayed by special guest R.L. Stine – comes to visit and tells Buster a spooky bedtime story. Then, Cheikh learns that he and his family will become American citizens!

programme.title: Arthur: Francine's Split Decision/Muffy Goes Metropolitan
programme.desc: Lakewood Elementary is sure to win the big bowling tournament on Saturday, but Francine's cousin is having his Bar Mitzvah at the same time! Muffy happily accepts an invitation to spend the weekend in the bustling Crown City.

programme.title: Arthur: Sleep No More/Pet Peeved
programme.desc: Buster is convinced that Pizza Paula's all-you-can-eat contest is his destiny. But how can he possibly win such an important contest without any sleep? Binky volunteers to look after Francine's cat, Nemo, for the weekend.

programme.title: Arthur: Prunella's Tent of Portent/Mutiny on the Pitch
programme.desc: At the Elwood City Picnic, Prunella pretends she can see the future at her fortune telling booth. The Lakewood Elementary soccer team has had enough of Francine's bossy behavior.

programme.title: Arthur: Francine Redecorates/Arthur The Loser
programme.desc: Francine and Catherine are very different, but it’s no fun if you're two sisters sharing the same room. Then, there's only one thing in life Arthur really wants—to win! But he just can't stop losing. Is it really so wrong to cheat a little?

programme.title: The Rise of the Nazi Party
programme.desc: In 1924, Hitler is convicted for High Treason after the failed Nazi power grab. In prison, he writes Mein Kampf, articulating his anti-Semitic and expansionist beliefs. Upon release, Hitler rebrands the Nazi Party.

programme.title: The Rise of the Nazi Party
programme.desc: In 1930s Germany, Hitler capitalizes on economic woes blaming the Weimar Government and Jews. Despite scandals, Nazi rallies gain popularity and emerge as the largest party. Hitler becomes Chancellor in 1933, using the 'Enabling Act' to seize power.

programme.title: The Rise of the Nazi Party
programme.desc: Adolf Hitler's secret agenda is to rid Germany of Jews. By 1938, after creating work schemes and rearming, he orchestrates "The Night of Broken Glass," burning 1,000 synagogues and killing 91 Jews, preparing for further aggression.

programme.title: The Rise of the Nazi Party
programme.desc: Hitler unveils his military plans: annex Austria, seize the Sudetenland, and eventually invade Poland and the Soviet Union. By March 1938, Austria falls bloodlessly. By September 1939, he invades Poland, sparking World War Two.

programme.title: The Rise of the Nazi Party
programme.desc: Hitler rules Europe triumphantly, hailed as a hero in Germany. Hitler invades the Soviet Union, promising swift victory over communism, but progress stalls. As Germany faces setbacks, Hitler retreats to his bunker in Poland, increasingly reliant on drugs.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Robin is desperate to meet her hunky, long-distance love in person. Nev and Max agree to help her hunt him down, but what they uncover turns out to be much more than Robin bargained for! (S6, ep17)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Mike & Caroline
programme.desc: Mike fell in love with Caroline online. He grew suspicious when she continually evaded meeting him, yet left notes at his car. Is Caroline an imposter or is she just afraid?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Caitlyn calls on Nev and Max to help separate the fact from fiction of her courtship with Kenton. Kenton insists she and her daughter move to Kentucky but is Kenton all he claims to be? (S6, ep20)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Harold & Armani
programme.desc: Harold found his match with a beautiful fellow jock named Armani. Although they live in the same area, they've never met. Nev is joined by Angel Haze to help Harold get his perfect girl. (S4, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Miranda & Cameryn
programme.desc: After years of online chats Miranda discovered that Cameryn was not the man he claimed to be. She confronted him only to be given another suspicious profile. Is he someone else entirely?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jasmine & Mike
programme.desc: Jasmine has been texting with Mike for two years and thinks he could be the perfect step-father for her son. Although they live only 15 minutes apart, the pair have yet to meet up in person.

programme.title: The Hills: Somebody Always Has to Cry
programme.desc: It's the gang's first holiday in LA but not everyone gets what they wish for. A New Year's kiss is hard to come by for Lauren when Jason learns she got a call from an old flame. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: The Hills: You Can't Just Be With Me?
programme.desc: Jason wants to make Lauren's 20th birthday special, but when she lies to him about working with male models for a Teen Vogue assignment, their relationship is put to the test. (S1, ep8)

programme.title: The City: If She Can Make It Here...
programme.desc: Whitney arrives in New York City during fashion week just in time to start her new career with iconic designer, Diane Von Furstenberg. (S1, ep1)

programme.title: The City: The Truth Will Reveal Itself
programme.desc: Whitney's world is turned upside-down when a boy from her past shows up to warn her that Jay has been fooling around. Olivia decides that befriending Whitney is her new project. (S1, ep2)

programme.title: The City: The L Word
programme.desc: Whitney gets mixed signals from Jay and decides to ask him directly where she stands. Erin's new boyfriend comes to visit and Whitney realizes it's time to find her own apartment. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: The City: Good Things Come In Threes
programme.desc: Whitney dates a new guy and Jay confesses to Adam his true feelings about Whitney. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: The City: Boys Night Out
programme.desc: Adam lets loose while his girlfriend Allie is out of town, but when she hears he kissed another girl from Whitney and the others, Adam finds himself in hot water. (S1, ep5)

programme.title: The City: He Never Said He Had a Girlfriend
programme.desc: Allie breaks down after a run in with the girl who claims she kissed Adam, but Adam sticks to his story to win Allie back, and Whitney gets upset with Jay for taking Adam's side. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: The City: The Truth Hurts
programme.desc: Kelly Cutrone accuses Allie of being too skinny, and Whitney finds herself caught in the middle. Erin runs into an ex-boyfriend and old feelings begin to return. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: The Hills: Love is Not a Maybe Thing
programme.desc: Heidi decides she's had enough drama with Jordan. When she turns to the girls for advice, she realises what she has to do. And are Lauren and Jason's fighting days finally behind them? (S1, ep9)

programme.title: The Hills: Timing is Everything
programme.desc: Lauren's work at LA Fashion Week brings a career opportunity of a lifetime, but she's torn between her job and Jason. Whitney leaves LA; Heidi and Audrina are single in the city. (S1, ep10)

programme.title: 48 Hours

programme.title: 48 Hours: Body of Lies
programme.desc: In 2006, 31-year-old Leisha Hurst, while attending Barstow College, began dating fellow student, 34-year-old Jeami Chiapulis. Chiapulis seemed to be the man she could settle down with. The couple had plans to marry when Hurst vanished on January 22, 2009

programme.title: 48 Hours: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: The investigation of the September 24, 1988 sexual torture-murder in Louisville, Kentucky, of Brenda Sue Schaefer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: While Innocents Slept
programme.desc: A report based on the murder case involving the deaths of two infants which were originally attributed to SIDS (Sudden Infant Death Syndrome).

programme.title: 48 Hours: Prime Suspect
programme.desc: Billy Fox, 33, is a devoted father of two and a soccer coach. He appears to be an all-around regular guy. But he’s booked for the death of a baby. It's a charge that could put him in prison for the rest of his life.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: The Mail Animal/Peanut-Brained Rooster/Mummy Dearest

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield and Odie trick Jon into not taking a trip on his vacation.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield is adopted by an elderly lady. Roy buys a robot that creates weather.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield tells the story of the Pied Piper of Hamlin, who has a cat.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield accidentally brings a baby home from the grocery store. Orson makes up a story to entertain the chicks.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Magic Mutt/U.S. Acres: Short Story/Monday Misery
programme.desc: When Jon goes to an all-night magic shop./Booker is irritated by his height./Garfield attempts to defeat the evil day, Monday.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield uses Nermal’s cuteness to get goodies. The crew finds a chocolate mine.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Money Machine
programme.desc: The economy of the small African country of Ghalea is threatened by a mass counterfeiting scheme directed by Walter DuBruis, one of the country's richest financiers.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Seal
programme.desc: America's relations with Kuala Rokat, a small neutral country on the China-India border, are threatened when a priceless national treasure, a carved jade seal, is stolen and bought by American art collector, J. Richard Taggart.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Sweet Charity
programme.desc: The fraudulent international activities of Gerald and Catherine Hagar, professional fund raisers for charity, take the IMF to an estate on the French-Italian border.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Council pt. 1

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Council pt. 2

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: The Park Kids decide to have a Dog Show to show off their pets. A rainy day has everyone stuck in the Caboose. Barney suggests fun activities.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Butterflies - Nature Of Things
programme.desc: Baby Bop is sad because she lost her pet caterpillar, Monty. Barney and the others try to help her find it. Baby Bop is surprised to discover Monty inside a chrysalis. Everyone is excited to find Monty—now a beautiful butterfly!

programme.title: Survivorman: Smoky Mountain Sasquatch

programme.title: Survivorman: Searching the Southwest
programme.desc: Les follows a trail from Texas to Utah in his quest to catch Bigfoot on camera. Locals report encounters in haunted mountains and spooky canyons, and Les applies scientific methods and his survival skills to lure the legend out of hiding.

programme.title: Survivorman: Hidden World of Bigfoot
programme.desc: Les jumps from forest to forest across North America in search of Sasquatch, returning to a legendary Bigfoot hotspot in the Canadian wild. Here, he'll use a brand-new approach to discover whether there's any way to explain mysterious noises in the night.

programme.title: Survivorman: Peru Amazonian Shamans

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: The discovery of vital evidence, more than 2,000 miles away from a murder victim's body, helps detectives piece together the case.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A woman disappears without a trace. Even though foul play is suspected, the leads don't pan out and the trail turns cold. Twenty years would pass before police are able to link a clump of hair discovered in an isolated area with the missing woman.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A talented television news anchor was shot to death outside her home. It appeared to be a crime of passion, perpetrated by an obsessed fan. A police dog tracked the scent of the killer through the adjacent woods and back to the crime scene.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A fire kills the 40-year-old estranged wife of a police officer. At first glance, the fire appeared to have been started by an unattended cigarette, but forensic scientists soon discover the cause is far more complicated.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A woman suddenly becomes ill. Her symptoms worsen over time, eventually leaving her unable to walk. A bone marrow test reveals arsenic poisoning. Investigators have to determine if it was groundwater contamination or something much more sinister.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Residents of Noel, Missouri were stunned to learn that their bank had been robbed and the bank president was missing. His body was later found floating in a lake, securely bound to a chair with duct tape. That duct tape would help solve the crime.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A husband is shot and killed during a camping trip and his wife tells two different versions of events which led to his death. Forensic psychiatry enables her to distinguish fact from fiction and evidence helps determine what really happened.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: The body of a 16-year-old girl was discovered nine months after she disappeared. Forensic scientists found clues that painted a virtual portrait of her killer. They knew he had a dog, worked for the postal service, and had red carpeting in his home.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A young woman fell to her death from a cliff overlooking the Pacific Ocean. Initially, investigators thought it was a tragic accident. But after a forensic exam of photos taken at the scene, police had a different picture of what had happened.

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: 100th

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Rules of Engagement: Pilot

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Young and the Restless

programme.desc: The doctors investigate what happens when blood is full of oxygen. Dr Xand visits a special medical collection of body parts to find out some ways in which human organs can go seriously wrong.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!

programme.title: Operation Ouch!

programme.title: Operation Ouch!

programme.title: Operation Ouch!

programme.title: Operation Ouch!

programme.title: Operation Ouch!

programme.title: Tonbo!

programme.title: Tonbo!

programme.title: Tonbo!

programme.title: Tonbo!

programme.title: Tonbo!
programme.desc: Tonbo's decision to leave the island deeply affected the nearby residents. Amidst mixed emotions, a farewell golf tournament was held with just one day left until her departure.

programme.title: Tonbo!

programme.title: Tonbo!
programme.desc: Igarashi sends high schooler Tonbo to a Kumamoto golf range, where her skill with a driver shot stuns others. There, she meets Hinoki Otowa, a top junior golfer from the Kyushu Championship, sparking a fierce rivalry.

programme.title: Tonbo!

programme.title: Flashpoint

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: Team One is alerted to a situation in a bank where a woman who appears under duress is withdrawing all her money. When she sabotages her own rescue and escapes with her tormentor, the team turn their attention to her family, who is also in danger.

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: As Donna gets ready to walk down the aisle, things changed drastically. She learns some surprising news regarding a mentor she once worked with.

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: Team One must figure out how to get a Chinatown gang to release a local shop owner, then they also have to figure out how to get the one who shot the owner's daughter free as well.

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: An ex-cop with a grudge against Greg Parker takes him hostage and threatens to drop him off an arena's megatron if Greg can't talk him down. Meanwhile his team discovers that they are helpless to use tactical options to save their boss.

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: When Spike answers Sam's sister's desperate plea for help, he is forced, at gunpoint, to help two criminals steal evidence from the fortress that is the Metro Evidence Depot.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: A voice trumpet brings a message for Dipsy and Laa-Laa. The Teletubbies watch some children learn about the number two.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies enjoy a big hug before watching a lady tell a story about four friends. She uses her hands to make actions to tell the story.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Andy Brown and some children go for a walk to find some red squirrels. The Teletubbies are playing a hiding game. Where are they? Can Noo-Noo find them?

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children learn about the colour orange. Laa-Laa loves her ball, she chases it all over Teletubbyland announcing to Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Po that her ball is orange.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: A voice trumpet appears and the Teletubbies dance, before watching two girls do some Flamenco dancing with their teacher. It's time for the Teletubbies to wash their feet. They love using their Tubby Sponges.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children mixing water, paint and washing up liquid to make bubble pictures. Po shows us how to make Tubby Custard before running off to watch three ships sail through Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch Simone and Cacha help make colourful costumes and then dance in a Carnival. Laa-Laa loves to play with her ball, it bounces everywhere. A magic house appears before it's time for Tubby Bye-Bye.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Tinky Winky and Dipsy step in some mud. They join Laa-Laa and Po to watch a little girl polish her family’s shoes. A magical carpet appears in Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Tubbies watch two boys having their hair cut. A mirror appears in Teletubbyland. Laa-Laa, Dipsy and Tinky Winky liked looking at their reflection in the mirror.

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The Mayor asks Bob to build a Pets Corner in the local park. Farmer Pickles has picked up a selection of animals for it – including a chinchilla – and sends Travis and Spud off to deliver them to Bob. Unfortunately Bob runs out of chicken wire.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Farmer Pickles is about to declare his Sunflower Oil business open, but there’s just one more job that he needs Bob to do. He needs a depot to store all the bottles of oil.

programme.title: Homes and Playgrounds
programme.desc: Join Bob and his “Can-Do” crew as they go back on site to show you the exciting real world of big machines! From bird’s nests to houses, we all need a home and in this brand new adventure Bob explains how they are built.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang are replacing some old pipes outside the town hall. Molly, meanwhile, is practicing for her first aid exam with a reluctant JJ as guinea pig. When Wendy calls JJ’s yard to order a special pipe and Molly offers to deliver it.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is tiling a roof and calls at JJ’s yard to pick up the materials. But there is only one pallet of the requisite red tiles in stock, so JJ promises to send the remainder of the order as soon as his delivery arrives.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Train enthusiast Mr Bentley is away for the day and, in his absence, Mrs Bentley decides to surprise her husband by asking Bob to build him a brand new model railway in the shed.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Today’s the day that the machines get to build their brand new shelter. It’s going to be built into the side of a hill and made using found materials. Lofty, who slept outside at the old yard, decides that he’d like a place in the new shelter.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Beasley’s pipes and boiler are making banging noises and Bob is called in to replace them. Whilst Bob and Wendy are collecting the new Boiler from JJ, Molly explains that she is looking after Mrs Broadbent’s baby rabbits.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scrambler is playing with the Sunflower Valley children; Sunny, Saffron, Carlo and Cassia in the playground. It’s the last day before they have to go back to school in Bobsville and they are all sad to be leaving.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and team are building a barn for Farmer Pickles’ sheep, which has to be ready for the lambing season. Farmer Pickles brings the sheep down from the hills and puts them in a pen until the barn is finished.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is demolishing an old house, and sends the floorboards and roof tiles for recycling. As he finishes the job, he gets a call from Mr Bentley who wants him to renovate the museum’s annexe, where Mr Ellis plans to exhibit the work of local artists.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob’s built a new waterwheel for the old watermill. He’s made it at the yard, but now needs to dismantle it to take it to the mill in sections. Bob needs Benny, Scoop, Lofty and Muck to carry the wheel sections through the marshland to the mill.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are drilling a special well at their homestead. The well has its own water tank, which needs to be raised from the ground on rocks. Wendy and Scrambler arrive for the first ever time in Sunflower Valley..

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is building a goat run for Farmer Pickles new goat – Giddy. It’s Travis’s job to collect Giddy from Meg MacDonald the goat breeder. Spud teases Travis about being slow and Travis resolves to collect the goat very quickly.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scoop and Dizzy have spent the night at Bob’s old yard in Bobsville to help Wendy with some digging and mixing. The machines all wish that Wendy could come and live out in Sunflower Valley.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Ashlocke goes back in time to try and make himself invincible by giving something to his the younger self, prompting Brennan and Shalimar to follow him.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team heads into the wilderness to track down a killer beast which is targeting hikers.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Ashlocke is desperate to find a cure for his fatal condition and infiltrates the Sanctuary to blackmail Adam into getting hold of the antidote.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: A military plane is shot down behind enemy lines, prompting the team to make a desperate bid to recover the secret government weapon hidden on board.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team sets out to save Brennan, who has become trapped inside an invisible town and is facing execution for a crime he didn't commit.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Three extraterrestrials who pose a serious threat to humanity target Shalimar, so the team sets out to save her from their evil clutches.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Fields
programme.desc: Liam investigates a mission run by the Church of the Companions when a friend of his disappears. Sandoval and the Taelons are concerned about "the fields" where something vital to the Taelons' survival is harvested.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Apparition
programme.desc: Liam investigates the suspicious death of a banker, which he saw in a dream. It seems to be an exiled Taelon spirit that is contacting him. Da'an berates Zo'or for his money and power hungry attitude.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: One Taelon Avenue
programme.desc: Joshua Doors is running his own technology development company and Renee goes undercover to find out what is going on. An artificial intelligence program of the Taelons that controls human minds seems to be acting on its own.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Abduction
programme.desc: A volunteer who was working to interpret an ancient message from Ma'el assaults Da'an and escapes through a portal. Sandoval helps Da'an avoid interrogation from Zo'or while they try to locate her.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Arrival
programme.desc: A Taelon shuttle is shot down over Antarctica. There are Jiridians aboard, but two of the passengers escape. When Augur discovers Lili's blood on the ship, he is convinced that she is not dead.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Forge of Creation
programme.desc: Lili, Vorjak, and the baby flee to find a shuttle to escape Earth. Liam and Sandoval are both tracking them - for different reasons. Augur is on the run from volunteers, but sends a friend (Juliet) to help Liam while he's gone.

programme.title: The Lost World: A Witch's Calling
programme.desc: While Roxton and Malone search for the missing Veronica, two young witches lure them away from safety. Unbeknownst to the explorers, a sorceress and her disciples plot to destroy Challenger.

programme.title: The Lost World: Brothers in Arms
programme.desc: Malone is pierced by a poison dart from a Keeran blowdart. Under the influence of the hallucinogenic poison, Malone relives his nightmarish experience as a battlefield correspondent in WWI.

programme.title: The Lost World: Ice Age
programme.desc: A new Ice Age threatens the ecosystem. The explorers investigate the site of a meteor crash and try to help a woman. Not knowing who she is, they are targeted by her cold-blooded subjects.

programme.title: The Lost World: The End Game
programme.desc: The intractable Death comes to settle her score with Lord Roxton. In a series of games, Roxton plays Death in an attempt to keep his life, as well as the lives of his friends.

programme.title: The Lost World: Phantoms
programme.desc: Veronica is led by the sound of piano music into the arms of a lover from a bygone era. Ignoring Challenger's warnings about her involvement with him, she falls quickly for her new beau.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Secret
programme.desc: An assassin threatens the explorers, and Marguerite fears that he may be linked to her past and come to settle old scores. The secret she tries to bury creates a rift between herself and Roxton.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Actors Alison Steadman and Larry Lamb add drama to the hunt for profits, as they team up with antiques experts Thomas Plant and Paul Laidlaw. Their trip begins in Arundel, then cruises along the Sussex coast to an auction at Eastbourne.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Jon Culshaw and Debra Stephenson team up with experts Thomas Plant and Mark Stacey, hunting antique bargains in and around Edinburgh before auction in Essex. Who will win the day? Hopefully both teams, as all profits go to Children in Need.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Eastenders veterans Pam St Clement and Rudolph Walker team up with experts Charles Hanson and James Braxton. They seek out antiques from East Sussex, Tumbridge, Wells in Kent, and finish up--dramatically--at auction at Rayleigh in Essex.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Goalkeepers Peter Shilton and Peter Schmeichel buy and sell antiques around Cheshire, aided by Paul Laidlaw and Mark Stacey. They visit a Cycling Museum in Warrington and a Football Museum in Manchester, ending up at auction in Runcorn.

programme.desc: Group A Day One.

programme.title: Tungsten Talk
programme.desc: Tom Sykes joins Tungsten Talk to discuss his successes and experiences at the MODUS Super Series.

programme.title: Tungsten Talk
programme.desc: John O'Shea joins Chris Murphy on Tungsten Talk to reflect on his career.

programme.title: The Story of Michael Smith
programme.desc: Henry Deacon and Matthew Edgar reflect on the story of Michael Smith discussing his career and achievements.

programme.title: Scott Mitchell- On the Farm
programme.desc: Join Scott Mitchell off the oche for an exclusive behind-the-scenes look at life on his farm.

programme.title: Tungsten Talk
programme.desc: Jamie Hughes joins Henry Deacon on Tungsten Talk to reflect on his darts career so far.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Levi & Will
programme.desc: Levi is convinced Will is his dream man and broke up with his boyfriend so they could be together. After always cancelling on Levi, Oobah and Nella suspect something fishy is going on. (S2, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Emma & Harlin
programme.desc: Julie and Oobah uncover more than they were expecting, as their search to help Emma find her online love Harlin takes a sinister turn. (S1, ep1)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Alayah & Tommy
programme.desc: Alayah and Tommy started messaging on a live streaming platform. Alayah thinks he could be the one, but when they try and meet, he keeps cancelling. Nella and Oobah help to track him down. (S2, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Mario & Hannah
programme.desc: After turning his life around, Mario met his soulmate, Hannah. But she refuses to speak on the phone and won't meet in person. Julie and Oobah try to find out who his dream girl really is. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Neil & Jasmin
programme.desc: Neil has been chatting to Jasmin for 3 years and she's stood him up 13 times. So it's up to Julie and Oobah to find out if the person Neil has fallen for...is real? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Tasheeka & Aaron
programme.desc: After avoiding video calls for 2 years, Tasheeka is desperate to find out if Aaron is her Prince Charming. It's up to Julie and Oobah to see if this online romance has a fairy tale ending. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Long Island Serial Killer
programme.desc: A report on the disappearance of Shannan Gilbert, near Gilgo Beach, New York. The search for Shannan led to the discovery of a total of ten bodies in the scrub brush of Gilgo Beach, leading police to suspect the work of a serial killer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Secrets, Lies and Alibis
programme.desc: John and Susan Sutton were sleeping in separate rooms in their Florida home, when a gunman entered their house and shot both of them several times. Susan was killed, but John survived. Nothing was taken from the house, proving the murder premeditated.

programme.title: 48 Hours: To Catch a Stalker
programme.desc: Fifteen-year-old Penny Chang of Shaker Heights, Ohio was stalked and killed by her older brother’s best friend, 21-year-old Scott Strothers.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Mystery of Slide Mountain
programme.desc: A report that examines evidence and unanswered questions regarding a June 1, 1998 auto accident on Slide Mountain, near Reno, Nevada, that led to the death of Rinette Riella Bergna and left the driver, Rinette’s husband Peter with only minor injuries.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Spies, Lies and Secrets
programme.desc: A report about the death of Shane Todd, a brilliant, high-tech engineer at a Singapore company who, according to his parents, was murdered because he was unwilling to share secrets that could harm the United States.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Question of Murder
programme.desc: John Maloney, a Wisconsin police officer, was convicted of murdering his estranged wife, Sandy, in 1999. He has always maintained his innocence. After Maloney’s conviction, the prosecutor, Joe Paulus, pled guilty to accepting bribes to fix over 20 cases
